tidbits.title: Cultural Fusion
tidbits.description: The country showcases a vibrant mix of cultures, influenced by African, Indian, European, and indigenous traditions, reflected in its music, festivals, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Carnival Celebrations
tidbits.description: Trinidad and Tobago is famous for its Carnival, a vibrant and colorful celebration featuring music, dance, elaborate costumes, and lively street parades.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: The islands offer diverse natural beauty, from Tobago's pristine beaches and coral reefs to Trinidad's lush rainforests and the unique Pitch Lake, the world's largest natural asphalt deposit.
